title: Justify highest 1st ionization energy - Cl or Ar

content.question:
Which of the following correctly identifies which
 has the higher first-ionization energy, Cl or Ar,
 and supplies the best justification?

choices.label: Cl, because of its higher electronegativity
Cl, because of its higher electron affinity

Ar, because of its completely filled valence
 shell
Ar, because of its higher effective nuclear charge

content.answer: Ar, because of its higher effective nuclear charge
